subject: [Radiance-general] Use of Radiance in the infrared
body:
I wonder if I could ask if it is possible to use Radiance to assess the albedo of an urban setting, e.g. a street gorge, where Radiance can take into account the near infra-red component of the solar spectrum as well as the visible one, please? Perhaps the visible component would have to be assessed first, and then the IR on a second run, after modifying the surface reflectances? Could Radiance be used like that?

Richard Watkins
Kent School of Architecture
University of Kent
Kent, UK
